and ingcName like '%{s_ingcName}%'
mapper.insert: insert into t_erp_ingoodscategory (ingcId, ingcCode, ingcName, ingcRemark, ingcSpell, ingcState, ingcDelflag, optId, currDate) values( #{ingcId}, #{ingcCode}, #{ingcName}, #{ingcRemark}, #{ingcSpell}, #{ingcState}, #{ingcDelflag}, #{optId}, #{currDate})
